Public Remarks: Nestled in the heart of Willow Glen, this charming 1900s Victorian Bungalow boasts w pride of ownership. Meticulously updated, this hm offers 3 separate units. The main hm has 2 beds 1.5 baths & offers a 1/1 finished basement apartment & a 1/1 quaint detached cottage that isnt included in the sq-ft. Its on a private 6492 sq-ft lot, w a large covered porch looking among the beautiful landscape & fruit trees. Upon entering the main hm, it brims w natural light thru the picturesque windows & features: recessed lighting, hardwood flooring thru-out the entire hm, crown molding & a wood burning fireplace. The kitchen features butcher block countertops & ample white shaker cabinetry. The hall connects the spacious beds & spa-like bath, laundry closet & a half bath. While living in the main hm, you can rent the other 2 units for excellent cash flow. The basement has 1 bed, 1 bath, full kitchen & a light filled living area. The cottage has a loft bed, 1 bath, kitchenette & spacious living area.
Showing Instruction: Text LA Business Card for COMBO Box CODE

En-Suite Primary Bath w/ double sinks, new light fixtures, shower, and separate tub. Four additional beds - one of which is currently being used as a separate family room. Elegant courtyard area outside w/ tile flooring, Ipe deck for dining, water feature, firepit area, and modern design for privacy - an entertainer's dream. Literally just steps away from Lincoln Avenue where you can enjoy The Table, Bills Cafe, Copita, and much more. This home will truly allow you to immerse yourself in everything that living in Willow Glen has to offer!

Public Remarks: Remodeled 1940's home in the heart of quintessential Willow Glen & just a few minutes walk to downtown. This custom home was remodeled with entertainment in mind. White Oak floors flow throughout the entire home & abundant windows allow light to flood the home. The center island in the kitchen is the hub of the home where family & friends gather. Quartzite counters & white cabinets give a classic look. The kitchen/great room combo has sliding doors to the hardscaped backyard where a gas fireplace is a focal feature & the covered pergola is ideal for dining on warm CA evenings. The primary bedroom is downstairs with french doors that open to the backyard & a large spa-like bathroom. The formal living room has an inviting gas fireplace & a smaller den/office across the hall is perfect for working from home. Upstairs are 2 large bedrooms & a fully remodeled bath. A walk-in attic tops off the second floor. With so many additional features not mentioned, this home is a must see.

Public Remarks: Nestled in the heart of Willow Glen, less than a 5 minute walk to town, sits this beautifully updated home. Open kitchen, alder cabinets, Viking fridge, stainless steel appliances, Thermador gas stove and oven. Slate flooring, marble honed countertops. Antique Carrera Marble in bar area w/wine fridge, small sink. Separate dining area that overlooks the beautiful grounds. Formal room that houses a charming fireplace along with another large gathering room. Full bathroom and bedroom downstairs. Library/office w/ built-in shelves. Wood flooring throughout, recessed lighting, AC/central heat. Huge primary room with vaulted ceilings, fireplace, walk in closet and a bathroom to die for. Detached garage with an additional room attached (permits unknown, buyer to investigate) and is being used as a gym-has access to a private oasis. Backyard is inviting with a fountain, large tree, stone walkways. Owned solar / water softener. Great basement with wine racks, laundry, art area/cabinets.

Public Remarks: Beautiful & charming Willow Glen home minutes from Downtown does not disappoint & is full of potential, fulfilling a buyers dream. The home includes a welcoming front porch, bay windows, updated kitchen & large bonus room that could serve as a bedroom or family room w/ a combined full bathroom & utility room. In post-Covid times, there is a beautifully functional home office & high-speed internet w/ its own private entrance from the spacious backyard w/ outdoor sitting areas. The large two car garage can serve a number of uses, such as game room, home theater, or workshop as there is ample parking in the tandem 3 car driveway. Want extra income? These days, ADUs are gold. With R-2 zoning, there is potential for converting the garage/office space into an ADU for family or rental income. Willow Glen is well known for amazing neighborhood holiday traditions and this holiday season will be no exception. You'll find your very own snowman in the garage just waiting to be displayed.

Iconic 1920's Spanish Craftsman in prime Willow Glen location. A spacious and stunning property with incredible period details meticulously preserved. Many modern upgrades created with precise attention to the Craftsman elements. This home is a personal favorite as expressed by the phenomenal neighbors. Gleaming solid hardwood floors, 9-foot ceilings, Batchelder tile fireplace, original style pushbutton light switches, lighting fixtures, a large basement, & solid unpainted gumwood moldings, windows, doors and trim throughout. Huge windows and 2 skylights make this warm home bright and welcoming. Gourmet cook's kitchen includes custom cherry shaker cabinets, Viking gas range with grill, walk-in pantry, stone countertops, large farmhouse sink, and a work desk. Plenty of space in the yard to add a master bath to create a master suite without losing the Zen-like atmosphere of the garden. Featured on the cover of Touring Willow Glen and just 1600 feet from Lincoln Ave shops and dining!

Public Remarks: Nestled on a quaint tree-lined street near downtown Willow Glen, this home seamlessly blends vintage charm with modern updates. Its Spanish-style architecture, complete with an old-world tile roof, exudes timeless elegance. Inside, warm hardwood floors lead to a living room boasting a classic fireplace and abundant natural light from many windows. The spacious dining room is perfect for formal gatherings. The updated kitchen features limestone countertops and Cherrywood cabinets, while French doors in the breakfast nook open to a manicured backyard. The basement offers versatility, and built-in speakers add ambiance throughout. The primary suite is a serene retreat with French doors, while a third bedroom doubles as a well-appointed office. Outside, the backyard oasis awaits with flowering plants, brick accents, and a natural gas BBQ. This home offers a vintage feel with all the comforts of modern living in an unbeatable location.

Public Remarks: Serenely nestled in Willow Glen, this refined residence epitomizes modern luxury. This masterpiece was designed by Robin McCarthy of ARCH Studio, Inc and carefully constructed by Brooke Shaw. A formal entry and dramatic high ceilings create an airy ambiance throughout. The grand room seamlessly integrates formal dining, a cozy family area, and a chef's kitchen with high-end appliances and a large island. Hardwood floors and natural stone accents exude timeless elegance. Downstairs, a full basement offers versatility with a full bath and a separate bedroom/office/workout room. Ascend to the upper level to find the large primary bedroom, flooded with natural light and offering views of lush greenery. Outside, a majestic redwood tree graces the manicured landscape. Enjoy the convenience of downtown Willow Glen's fine dining and boutique shops just moments away. This home presents a rare opportunity to experience the height of suburban living in one of Silicon Valley's most coveted neighborhoods.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Andrew T Nguyen - 415-425-2824 - Discover the epitome of Willow Glen! Built in 1985 with a generous and thoughtful 1,434 sqft floorplan, this meticulously maintained home features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, an attached 2 car garage, and a tranquil backyard haven. Inside, you'll find an open living space with hardwood floors and abundant natural light. Classic louvered window coverings blend timeless elegance with functional design. An updated kitchen featuring quartz countertops, high end stainless steel appliances, and ample cabinet space are ready to efficiently and expertly host your dinner parties. A primary bedroom retreat is complete with an ensuite bathroom for maximum convenience and comfort. Step out back and find yourself in your own private backyard oasis, filled with a manicured yard with lush greenery, luxury fountain, and patio with motorized awning. Pride of ownership is exemplified by the abundance of mature fruit trees. This home is ready for the long haul, evidenced by the Hardie Plank cement board siding and Presidential composition roof, effortlessly complimenting the lush tree lined streets of Lupton Ave. Just a stone's throw away from downtown Willow Glen, 1691 Lupton is conveniently located in the heart of one of San Jose's most coveted neighborhoods. See more at 1691Lupton.com.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this stunning updated home in the desirable Willow Glen neighborhood. Situated on a tree-lined street, this home offers a peaceful retreat with no back neighbors and a picturesque view of the Los Gatos Creek. Step inside and be greeted by an abundance of natural light that fills the spacious living area through large picture windows. The living room features a cozy fireplace and four nearly floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase the breathtaking views of the backyard grounds. Imagine relaxing in this serene space, surrounded by lush greenery and the soothing sounds of nature. This layout is perfect for entertaining guests or enjoying family gatherings. . Step outside into the private backyard and discover the true beauty of this home. The expansive deck is an ideal setting for hosting outdoor gatherings or simply enjoying a peaceful evening under the stars. With no back neighbors, you'll experience a sense of tranquility and privacy, as if living in the countryside.

Public Remarks: Tucked away in a quiet pocket of highly sought-after North Willow Glen, this enchanting 3-Bedroom home boasts stunning curb appeal. The street is lined with trees and is located just minutes to downtown WG. Featuring extensive upgrades throughout, including gleaming hardwood floors. Large Living Room showcases a refaced fireplace with gas insert, Andersen slider, and built-in cabinet with desk. The renovated Kitchen is equipped with a farmhouse sink, contemporary oak cabinets, granite countertop & backsplash, double oven, gas stove, tile floors and ample counter space. The open-beam Formal Dining Room can also double as a Family Room or Office. The generously sized bedrooms and updated bathrooms add to the home's charm. Additional features include indoor laundry room, easy maintenance artificial grass in front yard, air conditioning, recessed lights, dual pane windows, copper plumbing, crown molding/ baseboards, sun tunnels, ceiling fan, composition roof. Tranquil backyard setting with covered patio, brand new grass, a lovely Persimmon tree, garden bed, and an array of flowers and drought resistant plants. Easy commute access to 280, 87, 101 Freeways. Close to restaurants, shopping and conveniences. This home is zoned for Willow Glen Schools. DISCOVER THIS SECRET TREASURE!

Public Remarks: Welcome to 1083 Glen Echo Ave! Situated on a coveted street in Willow Glen, this stunning 3bed/2ba home offers 1,725sqft of living space + a detached casita w/ full bthrm. Inside, the elegance of vibrant flooring throughout, recessed lighting & skylights infuse every corner w/ tons of natural light. A spacious LR boasts a cozy fireplace & a wall of custom built-ins. The adjacent DR flows seamlessly into the gourmet kitchen, featuring quartz counters, SS appls, 6 burner gas stove w/ wall mount pot filler & center island w/ built-in wine fridge. The primary suite is complete w/ a skylight, walk in closet & spa-like bthrm. Two sun filled bdrms overlook the bckyrd, one of which offers an ideal setting for home office. The bckyrd is an extension of the living space & features a cozy patio w/ pergola & outdoor kitchen w/ built in BBQ. Add'l amenities incl. solar, EV charger, water softener & an unfinished basement. Walkable location to restaurants & boutiques, Bramhall Park, schools & more!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Cheerful and bright home is situated on a corner lot in the heart of Willow Glen. A family home for generations; it's located just a short walk from the quaint Willow Glen village with restaurants, shopping, library, churches and a park. An ideal neighborhood to live, and raise a family. Entertain family and friends in this freshly updated home with two courtyards, one in back and another just outside the kitchen. The large open gourmet kitchen has a large island, stainless steel appliances, granite counters and slate floors. The dining room includes a bar and small gas fireplace. Multiple venues offer a cozy conversation either in the living room with a fireplace or den off the kitchen. First floor includes two bedrooms, a full bath with a clawfoot tub, laundry area and a half bath with a deep sink for that fury family member. Upstairs includes a large primary bedroom, bath, a bedroom/office and library area. Low maintenance manicured yard with automated watering and easy to maintain landscaping. Public Remarks: A charming home with plenty of curb appeal, nestled in the Heart of Willow Glen. It's only a half mile from downtown and just a block from Willow Street Park. Enjoy the recently remodeled modern kitchen with high-end appliances and plenty of natural light. Both bathrooms have been recently remodeled with quality finishes. The home comes with an upstairs loft plus a separate private large bed/office/den/music or art room with a fireplace. Hardwood floors and a living room wall of windows overlook the private and lush entertainer's backyard, a covered rear patio with fruit trees, succulents, and a gazebo. Inside laundry/mud room with sink and plenty of cabinets. Andersen dual pane windows and doors, central heating and AC.

Public Remarks: Welcome home! Stripped down to the studs and completely renovated with added square footage in highly desirable Willow Glen. This home stands out with a fresh look inside and out with new landscaping making it pop with curb appeal. Step inside where you'll find an abundance of space, high ceilings with plenty of natural light gleaming off the new designer flooring. The kitchen boasts sleek quartz countertops, glass-tile backsplash and top of the line appliances. The open floor plan is perfectly suited for large gatherings with lots of room to roam. The primary suite has a walk-in shower with sharp new fixtures & detailed finishes. Close-by are two more bedrooms and a guest bathroom with a shower/tub combo that leaves no detail spared. A fourth bedroom with en-suite bath can be used as a flex space, perfect for guests or envision an office/living room combination. This home is perfect for indoor-outdoor entertaining with large sliders opening out onto a spacious backyard deck. Take a stroll through the friendly confines of this delightful neighborhood, right around the corner is Willow St. Park or head to downtown Willow Glen where you'll find a plethora of quality restaurants, shops & live entertainment. Prime location, short distance to the freeway. 2-car attached garage.
Showing Instruction: Call Listing Agent,Go Directly,Leave Card,Lockbox - Supra iBox Bluetooth LE

Public Remarks: Nestled in one of the most sought-after locations in Willow Glen, this authentic Tuscan-inspired home has it all. Situated on a picturesque, tree-lined street in an amazing neighborhood offering the perfect blend of luxurious living and convenient access to town. The home features four spacious bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom! Two of these bedrooms are beautiful Primary suites w/one located on the first level, ideal for guests or those desiring single-level living. The chef's kitchen offers top-of-the-line appliances, a spacious design with large island and an open concept for social gatherings and making meal preparation a delight. The family room space is beautiful with picturesque walls of windows, high ceilings, library inspired entertainment wall with gas fireplace and french doors flowing to the private back garden. Fabulous floor plan for family gatherings or entertaining with ease. The home is also equipped with laundry facilities on both levels, adding to the convenience and ease of daily living. Enjoy a short stroll to town where a variety of fine dining, shopping, farmers market & coffee options await. The vibrant community and charming atmosphere of Willow Glen make this home a perfect haven for those seeking a blend of luxury and a small town lifestyle.

You won't want to miss behind the detached garage another room/shed which can be used for many things, i.e. kids playroom, home office or a studio.
